gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific Connect App using its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the Connect App with SID CAXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

gold.user: User needs to update the configuration of an existing Connect App.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the Connect App with new parameters and returns the updated details.

gold.user: User wants to delete a specific Connect App that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Confirms the deletion of the Connect App with SID CAXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

gold.user: User wants to list all Connect Apps associated with their account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all Connect Apps under the account with their details.
